title: The Vandraven House: Ghost Seekers by Dale Drake
description:
Enjoy this latest journey to the madness that is Vandraven. - Dale Drake

🖋️ The Author: https://www.amazon.com/Dale-Drake/e/B00HABX8M4/
📹 Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHUaZpCJNhM
📖 Read Along!: https://www.amazon.com/Family-Dale-Drake-ebook/dp/B0B36PZ21R/

Check out my new books! A collection of Creepypasta compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends!

👕 Shirts & Stuff!: https://shop.spreadshirt.com/MrCreepyPasta/
💰 Patreon (Only if you want to kids!): https://www.patreon.com/MrCreepyPasta
